original: 《三國演義》中的虛構人物，為袁術部將。討董聯軍於汜水關和董卓軍大將華雄交戰，俞涉請戰，交手不滿三合，即被華雄斬殺。
text: The fictional character in "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" is Yuan Shubu. Discussing Dong Lianjun Yu Bangshuiguan and Dong Zhuojun General Hua Xiong, Yu She asked for a fight, but he was dissatisfied with the triad, and he was killed by Hua Xiong.
